translations.translation: And the earth - We spread it like a carpet and how well We smoothed it out!
We spread the earth a carpet; what comfort We provide!
And the earth – We spread it out, and how well have We smoothed it!
We have spread out the earth and how brilliantly it is spread!
And We made the earth a base, so how well do We lay out!
And We have made the earth a Firash; how excellent spreader (thereof) are We!
And the earth, We have made it a wide extent; how well have We then spread (it) out.
And the earth -- We spread it forth; O excellent Smoothers!
And the earth have We laid out, how gracious is the Spreader (thereof)!
We have spread out the earth, how well We have spread it out,
And the earth! We have stretched it forth beneath; an excellent Spreader are We!
And We have spread out the earth, so how excellent spreaders We have been!
And We have spread out the (spacious) earth: How excellently We do spread out!
And We have spread out the earth, how Excellent Spreader (thereof) are We!
and We cradled the earth. And We are the Best of Cradlers.
And the earth—We spread it out—How well We prepared it!
And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
[51:48] And the earth, We spread it out: We made it level: what excellent Spreaders then!, We are.
(And the earth have We laid out) on water, (how gracious was the Spreader (thereof)!

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَاهِدُونَ } معناه بَسَطناهَا
 والماهدُ: البَاسِطُ

translations.translation:
And His saying, "And We have spread out the earth and placed therein stabilizers" - its meaning is that We have flattened it.


And the moon: the most extended.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَٱلأَرْضَ } أيضاً { فَرَشْنَاهَا } ومهدناها بالاستقلال والاستيلاء التام { فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَاهِدُونَ } [الذاريات: 48] الباسطون نحن بلا مشاركة


{ وَ } مثل ما خلقلنا العلويات فواعل مؤثرات
 والسفليات قوابل متأثرات { مِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ } من الأشياء الكائنة في بقعة الإمكان
